name: Neon Flick Ice Hockey
description:
Simple and addictive gameplay, impressive dribbling skills and tricks, 5 different game modes: Arcade, Gravity, Shooting, Penalty and Shooting, improved realistic physics.

You can become the ultimate master of field hockey.

Play all you want for free, there are no limits on gems and coins.

Unlock more than 20 beautiful new balls and different football fields.

Neon Flick Ice Hockey is easy to play, but hard to master!
